title: Can we bring back a version of sword of the occult?
body: I really do miss that item. Its kind of unfair that mejais gets promoted while soto gets removed from the game.

replies.body: Like I said in the last SotO thread, do you really want SotO and Jhin in the same game?
Maybe if they merged it with something like Avarice Blade for a theme.  Might be cool to sacrifice gold to an item to buff it up in some way, though it might only ever give AD if that was the case.

Either that or they should remove mejais

I'd like to see it back if mejais is in the game.
They need to fix shit like Zed's ending games with 600AD and so on before they do something like that.
NO! If anything {{item:3041}} should get removed too.
I did say a version of the soto. I know the item was broken on some champions ({{champion:107}} {{champion:119}} ) but it was a fun item.
